name: Will it die?
description:
Will it die? That's what you will need to find out. Will you be able to make sure that the clones get smart enough to find a way out of this, lab? 

But be aware that the scientists are smart as well, they have put a time limit for each clone, so you will have to hurry.

P.S The clones get smarter when they die... If you ask, why? Because the theme of the game jam was "Death is only the beginning" and after a couple hours of brainstorming this idea sounded fun and interesting. We tried to make the best we could in the time we had, so we hope that you will like what we have made.Comment your best time in which you managed to win!
Developers best time was 22s, see if you can manage to win quicker.

How to play?
  • In the upper left corner you will see the current active mechanics you have.
  • In the upper right corner you will see a timer that shows how much time you have left to find a way to kill the clone.
  • Settings are below the floating arrow on the right side of main screen.
How to install?

1. Download the game.
2. Unzip it.
3. Launch the "Will it die.exe".

Have fun playing!
Credits

Notice:
The game is still in a very early stage of development, so bugs can occur, if you find a bug, be free to write about it in the comments, so we can fix that!
Also, if you get stuck, for example the level is empty, press ESC and go to main menu, and then you can play again.
